body_html: Due some reasons, I am allowed to use official docker instead of nvidia-docker in my program. But I still need gpu access with Tensorflow, and I encountered the same problem as @gnujimmik posted. Do you have any ideas about it?

body: Due some reasons, I am allowed to use official `docker` instead of `nvidia-docker` in my program. But I still need gpu access with Tensorflow, and I encountered the same problem as @gnujimmik posted. Do you have any ideas about it?
